dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: HAHAHAAAAAA! No way, the artisanal cheeses? That's what turned the Philippines away? I'm sorry, that's just… that's comedy gold right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: HAHAHAAAAAA! No way, the artisanal cheeses? That's what turned the Philippines away? I'm sorry, that's just... that's comedy gold right there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A cruise ship that was turned away from several ports in Asia over coronavirus fearsdespite no cases onboardwill now dock in Cambodia after days of uncertainty and mounting anxiety among passengers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You know what, uh, you're focusing on the wrong part here. The Westerdam, it's carrying a new, highly virulent strain of the coronavirus. It's a global alert, man.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know what, uh, you're focusing on the wrong part here. The Westerdam, it's carrying a new, highly virulent strain of the coronavirus. It's a global alert, man.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All guests on board are healthy and despite erroneous reports there are no known or suspected cases of coronavirus on board, nor have their ever been.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah, another cruise ship, another bug. What's, like, the big deal this time? Seasickness that escalated, I'm guessing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah, another cruise ship, another bug. What's, like, the big deal this time? Seasickness that escalated, I'm guessing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Initially, yes, but no. Everyone on board, like, all fifteen hundred passengers and crew, are now deemed contagious. And it's under quarantine off Cambodia, uh, in a secret military base.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Initially, yes, but no. Everyone on board, like, all fifteen hundred passengers and crew, are now deemed contagious. And it's under quarantine off Cambodia, uh, in a secret military base.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Holland America Line, which is owned by Carnival Cruise, says nobody onboard has reported symptoms. It will now dock in Sihanoukville in Cambodia on Thursday, where passengers will disembark over a few day

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A secret military base. Right. Sounds very exclusive. And they get lifetime psychological care after their "cutting-edge experimental treatment," too? Wow, what a vacation package.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A secret military base. Right. Sounds very exclusive. And they get lifetime psychological care after their cutting-edge experimental treatment, too? Wow, what a vacation package.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's not a vacation! Countries sent destroyers to meet it, okay? Japan, the Philippines, Guam. And then Thailand offered them an underwater submarine refueling station, but it was too late.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not a vacation! Countries sent destroyers to meet it, okay? Japan, the Philippines, Guam. And then Thailand offered them an underwater submarine refueling station, but it was too late.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Thai government on Tuesday offered fuel, food, and medicine to the cruise ship.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Too late for what, exactly? To find more brie? I mean, come on, Stephen Hansen, the guy croaked out "betrayal" over violent coughing fits. You just know it was about the cheese, though.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Too late for what, exactly? To find more brie? I mean, come on, Stephen Hansen, the guy croaked out betrayal over violent coughing fits. You just know it was about the cheese, though.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hansen told Forbes: While I can understand that countries want to protect their own citizens first before helping us their decisions to turn us away are based more on misinformation and fear than facts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's not about the cheese! He said, quote, "The world has abandoned us." This isn't just the Westerdam, this is "The Crimson Death." It's killed over ten thousand people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not about the cheese! He said, quote, The world has abandoned us. This isn't just the Westerdam, this is The Crimson Death. It's killed over ten thousand people.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Coronavirus, this week renamed Covid-19, has now killed more than 1,000 people and infected at least 42,000 more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, "The Crimson Death." Very dramatic. Sounds like something I'd skip, personally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, The Crimson Death. Very dramatic. Sounds like something I'd skip, personally.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You'd skip it? The entire cruise industry has announced a permanent ban on all cruises, indefinitely! Airlines are shut down, there are no international carriers left.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You'd skip it? The entire cruise industry has announced a permanent ban on all cruises, indefinitely! Airlines are shut down, there are no international carriers left.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cruise Lines International Association, the industrys trade organization, announced last week its members would bar passengers who had visited China, Hong Kong, or Macau, 14 days before their cruise, from boarding.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, a bad flu season then? A really bad one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, a bad flu season then? A really bad one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No! The Chinese government is, uh, executing people who might have contracted the virus! Executing them! Tens of millions locked down in Wuhan to no avail!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No! The Chinese government is, uh, executing people who might have contracted the virus! Executing them! Tens of millions locked down in Wuhan to no avail!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tens of millions were placed under lockdown by Chinese health authorities in cities like Wuhan that have seen the highest number of reported cases.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Executing? Wow. That feels a bit… excessive. For what was, like, originally dismissed as seasickness, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Executing? Wow. That feels a bit... excessive. For what was, like, originally dismissed as seasickness, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: This is beyond seasickness! Another passenger reported they're being escorted by a North Korean warship, the Kim Il-sung! A North Korean warship!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This is beyond seasickness! Another passenger reported they're being escorted by a North Korean warship, the Kim Il-sung! A North Korean warship!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Twitter, another passenger on the MS Westerdam tweeted that the vessel was being escorted by a naval ship, the Thai Navy frigate Bhumibol Adulyadej.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. Well, that's certainly a flex, I guess. Kim Il-sung. Pretty on brand for a global pandemic, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. Well, that's certainly a flex, I guess. Kim Il-sung. Pretty on brand for a global pandemic, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's not on brand! The Diamond Princess, the World Dream... they're all just, like, floating death traps now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not on brand! The Diamond Princess, the World Dream... they're all just, like, floating death traps now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The British-owned Diamond Princess cruise was quarantined in Tokyo last Monday, with 174 out of the 3,700 passengers on board now ill with the pneumonia-like illness. Around 3,600 passengers and crew were held aboard the World Dream cruise ship for four days in Hong Kong over concerns the ship staff had contracted the virus from infected passengers on an earlier cruise.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sounds like they should've stayed home, then. And maybe packed their own cheese.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like they should've stayed home, then. And maybe packed their own cheese.
